title: 15ML Round Bottle (22MM, 25MM)
description: Small 15ml round amber PET bottle with 22mm/25mm neck finish. Suitable for pharmaceutical samples, essential oils, or cosmetic serums. Amber color provides UV protection for light-sensitive liquids.

title: 30ML Round Bottle
description: 30ml round amber PET bottle ideal for medicines, syrups, or cosmetic liquids. Compact size makes it perfect for travel packs and sample products.

title: 60ML Round Bottle
description: 60ml round PET bottle commonly used in pharmaceuticals, sanitizers, and lotions. Durable, lightweight, and portable for healthcare applications.

title: 100ML Round Bottle
description: 100ml round amber PET bottle with pharma-grade quality. Designed for syrups, tonics, and cosmetic solutions requiring protection from light.

title: 300ML Dome Bottle
description: 300ml dome-shaped PET bottle ideal for lotions, body oils, or pharmaceutical syrups. Ergonomic design with smooth dome finish.

title: 400ML Round Bottle
description: Large 400ml amber PET bottle suitable for family packs of syrups, tonics, or cosmetic liquids. High capacity with excellent strength.

title: 450ML Round Bottle (26GM, 32GM)
description: 450ml round PET bottle with weight variations (26gm, 32gm). Designed for bulk packaging of syrups, hand sanitizers, and healthcare liquids.

title: Best Selling Bottles Poster
description: Poster showcasing the best-selling PET bottle models by Sarash Packaging Solutions. Includes various shapes and sizes for pharma and cosmetic use.

title: Mixed Bottle Set
description: Collection of different bottle sizes and shapes. Represents the wide variety of packaging solutions available for pharma and cosmetics.

title: Colored Bottle Collection
description: Group image featuring PET bottles in various colors and sizes. Suitable for healthcare, cosmetics, and personal care packaging.

title: Cosmetic Jars & Bottles Collection
description: A collection of cosmetic jars and PET bottles, showcasing packaging options for creams, lotions, and healthcare solutions.

title: Brute 100ML, 200ML Bottles
description: Strong and durable PET bottles in 100ml and 200ml capacity. Ideal for pharmaceuticals and high-viscosity liquids.

title: DISC TOP CAP
description: Disc top cap commonly used for lotions, shampoos, and healthcare liquids. Easy-to-open design ensures convenient dispensing.

title: DISPENSER PUMP
description: Dispenser pump ideal for hand wash, liquid soap, sanitizers, and cosmetic creams. Ensures controlled dispensing with every press.

title: DROPPER TIP CAP
description: Dropper tip cap suitable for precise dispensing of medicines, eye drops, and essential oils. Provides safe, controlled flow.

title: EDIBLE OIL CAP
description: Plastic cap designed for edible oil bottles. Provides leak-proof sealing and hygienic storage.

title: EDIBLE OIL UPPER CAP
description: Upper cap for edible oil bottles. Ensures spill-free pouring and durability for long-term storage.

title: FLIP TOP CAP
description: Flip top cap designed for shampoos, lotions, and healthcare liquids. User-friendly design for one-handed operation.

title: Measuring Cap
description: Graduated measuring cap for precise liquid measurement. Widely used in pharmaceuticals and syrups.

title: MIST SPRAY PUMP
description: Fine mist spray pump designed for perfumes, sanitizers, and cosmetic sprays. Provides even atomization.

title: PR, ROPP Cap
description: Plastic ROPP cap (Roll-On Pilfer Proof) suitable for pharma bottles. Provides secure sealing with tamper-evidence.

title: SQUEEZE DROPPER
description: Plastic squeeze dropper bottle designed for eye/ear drops and small liquid doses. Offers precision dispensing.

title: Tablet Container 60ML
description: 60ml tablet container suitable for storing capsules and tablets. Airtight PET material ensures moisture protection.

title: Tablet Container 150ML, 200ML
description: 150ml and 200ml PET containers designed for tablets and capsules. Secure closure to ensure pharma-grade storage.

title: TRIGGER SPRAY PUMP
description: Trigger spray pump designed for household cleaners, disinfectants, and cosmetic sprays. Provides wide spray coverage.
